recordTypes.name: Business Information
recordTypes.description: Welcome to the City of North St. Paul.  Thank you for registering your business with us.

recordTypes.name: Road Restriction Allowance
recordTypes.description: Moving heavy loads on City streets during posted road restrictions requires prior approval from the City of North St. Paul. If you need an allowance during this time, please complete this application for staff review.

recordTypes.name: Well Head Sealing Authorization
recordTypes.description: Cost-share program to encourage residents to seal abandoned wells to protect the City's groundwater.

recordTypes.name: Cannabis and Low Potency Hemp Edibles Registration
recordTypes.description: All establishments selling cannabis or low potency hemp edibles must apply for an annual license from the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Mobile Food Vendor License
recordTypes.description: Mobile Food Vendors must apply for the annual Mobile Food Vendor License.

recordTypes.name: Façade Improvement Program
recordTypes.description: The Façade Improvement Grant Program aims to strengthen, revitalize and sustain Downtown North St. Paul by encouraging and assisting property owners to make improvements to buildings within the Downtown area.

recordTypes.name: Film Production Permit
recordTypes.description: As part of Minnesota Film’s Film Ready Community Program, North St. Paul actively supports film, television, and media productions by providing a streamlined permit process. This permit makes it easier for production teams to access local resources and film at our city’s unique locations, helping showcase what North St. Paul has to offer.

recordTypes.name: Ball Field Sign Agreement
recordTypes.description: Advertise your business with a sign at one of our athletic facilities while helping the City support future park improvements. Banners are displayed from May through September.

recordTypes.name: Citywide Garage Sale
recordTypes.description: Register your North St. Paul Garage Sale for our Citywide Garage Sale event on May 1-3, 2025. Register your address and pay the $10 fee to receive a Garage Sale Yard Sign, be listed on the North St. Paul website.

recordTypes.name: Beekeeping Registration
recordTypes.description: Any resident interested in beekeeping on their property must complete an annual registration with the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Backflow Preventer Test Report
recordTypes.description: If your property is heated by a boiler we need an annual backflow preventer test filed with the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Liquor License
recordTypes.description: All establishments offering off-sale intoxicating liquors must apply for an annual license from the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Dumpster or Temporary Storage Container Permit
recordTypes.description: If your project requires you to place a dumpster on the street, you will need to apply for a Dumpster Permit from the City of North St. Paul. Permits will be granted only to City-licensed dumpster haulers.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Permit
recordTypes.description: A zoning permit applies to driveway, fence, shed, patio, and retaining wall projects.

recordTypes.name: Right-of-Way Permit
recordTypes.description: Right of Way permits are required for any work in the public right of way near streets, including street cuts and underground work that extends into the public right of way.

recordTypes.name: Lawn Fertilizer Applicator License
recordTypes.description: Commercial contractors applying fertilizer or other lawn treatment in the City of North St. Paul must obtain a license annually from the City. The Lawn Fertilizer Applicator License fee is $80.

recordTypes.name: Criminal Record/Background Consent
recordTypes.description: Applicants applying for certain licenses must authorize the North St. Paul Police Department to conduct a background check.

recordTypes.name: Duplex /Twin Home Rental License
recordTypes.description: To ensure the safety of our residents, the City of North St. Paul requires all duplex rental units be licensed and inspected annually.

recordTypes.name: Chicken Registration
recordTypes.description: Any resident interested in hosting a chicken coop on their property must apply for a license from the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Buckthorn Puller/Weed Wrench
recordTypes.description: Residents can reserve a Buckthorn Puller/Weed Wrench from the City Office for 5 days. Complete your reservation online and pick it up at City Hall when one is available.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Electrical permits are required for all electrical work.

recordTypes.name: Body Art Enterprise
recordTypes.description: All Boy Art Enterprise businesses in the City of North St. Paul must be licensed annually.

recordTypes.name: Consumption and Display Liquor Permit
recordTypes.description: No business establishment or club which does not hold an on-sale intoxicating liquor license may directly or indirectly allow the consumption and display of alcoholic beverages or knowingly serve any liquid for the purpose of mixing with intoxicating liquor without first having obtained a permit from the City.

recordTypes.name: Foster Care, Day Care and Group Home Inspection
recordTypes.description: As required by Ramsey County, the City of North St. Paul inspects any home requesting foster care, day care or group home status.

recordTypes.name: Potentially Dangerous Dog / Dangerous Dog Registration
recordTypes.description: Residents with dogs deemed dangerous or potentially dangerous by the City must file and complete an annual license registration.

recordTypes.name: National Night Out 2025
recordTypes.description: National Night Out is an annual celebration to encourage community-building that promotes police-community partnerships. National Night Out will take place on Tuesday, August 5th, 2025.

recordTypes.name: Cigarette & Tobacco Sale License
recordTypes.description: License for the retail sales of cigarettes and/or tobacco sales in the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Right-of-Way Registration
recordTypes.description: Any contractor performing work in the public right-of-way must be licensed annually by the City of North St. Paul. The Right of Way License fee is $220.

recordTypes.name: Refuse Collection License (Commercial)
recordTypes.description: All garbage haulers servicing commercial properties in the City of North St. Paul must be licensed. The Garbage Refuse Collection License for commercial haulers is $220.

recordTypes.name: Data Disclosure Request: Minnesota Government Data Practices Act
Multi-Family Housing Rental License
recordTypes.description: To ensure the safety of our residents, the City of North St. Paul requires all multi-family rental units be licensed annually and inspected every two years.

recordTypes.name: Hydrant Meter Permit
recordTypes.description: If your project requires temporary water service you will need a Hydrant Meter Permit from the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Block Party Application
recordTypes.description: Plan a block party with your neighbors. Complete this application so the City of North St. Paul can assist with barricades and other needs.

recordTypes.name: Charitable Gambling Permit
recordTypes.description: Organizations hosting charitable gambling in the City of North St. Paul must apply for a gambling permit for their scheduled acvitites.

recordTypes.name: Property Watch Request
recordTypes.description: Inform the North St. Paul Police Department of your vacation plans to request additional drivebys and to update your emergency contact information.

recordTypes.name: Electric/Water/Garbage & Recycling Utility Service
recordTypes.description: Establish, update or change your North St. Paul residential electric, water, and garbage and recycling services.

recordTypes.name: Tree Trimming License
recordTypes.description: Any contractor conducting tree trimming or tree care services in the City of North St. Paul must be licensed annually. The Tree Trimmer license fee is $80.

recordTypes.name: Rental Property Change of Ownership or Management
recordTypes.description: Notify the City of North St. Paul of any ownership or management changes in your  rental property so we can update your license.

recordTypes.name: Rain Garden Permit
recordTypes.description: To ensure the initial construction and ongoing maintenance of a rain garden is performed satisfactorily, a permit shall be required for the operation of rain gardens located in the right-of-way and on private property.

recordTypes.name: Native Vegetation Permit
recordTypes.description: Any resident interested in native landscaping on their property must apply for a permit from the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Trenching Contractor License (Commercial Plumbing and Utility Permit)
recordTypes.description:
Contractors conducting any kind of trenching in the City must be licensed annually. The fee for a Trenching Contractor License is $80.

The Trenching Contractor  License fee is waived for licensed plumbers.

recordTypes.name: Kennel License
recordTypes.description: Any resident in the City of North St. Paul with three or more dogs must apply for a no-cost Kennel License.

recordTypes.name: Single Family Rental License
recordTypes.description: To ensure the safety of our residents, the City of North St. Paul requires all single family rental units be licensed and inspected annually.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Signs in the City should be kept within reasonable boundaries consistent with the objectives and goals of the community to retain its special character and economic advantages. A sign permit ensures the quality of the sign's appearance and its compliance with the City's current ordinances.

recordTypes.name: Temporary On-Sale Liquor License
recordTypes.description: This license is for non-profits or clubs who need a short-term liquor license for a specific event.

recordTypes.name: Tenant Consent to Inspect
recordTypes.description: Help us safely inspect your North St. Paul housing. Please complete a  consent to inspect form with us.

recordTypes.name: Storm Water Pollution Prevention Plan Permit
Liquor Sales: Extension of Premises
recordTypes.description: This license is for existing liquor license holders who wish to extend their liquor sales to an area outside of their permitted business for a limited time or special event.

recordTypes.name: Courtesy Bench License
recordTypes.description: License to host a courtesy bench in the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Underground Tank  Removal Permit
recordTypes.description: Removing an underground tank to repair/replace or remove? Complete an Underground Tank Removal Permit from the City to ensure the safety of your project.

recordTypes.name: Property and Special Assessment Verification Request
recordTypes.description: Title companies, realtors, and potential residents interested in determining if there are any outstanding assessments on a property may request a Property and Special Assessment Verification Report from the City.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Conditional Use-Level 3 Home Occupation Permit
Special Event Permit
recordTypes.description: A written application for a special event permit shall be completed and provided to the City not less than 30 days before the proposed event date.

recordTypes.name: Underground Tank  Installation Permit
recordTypes.description: All underground tank installations in the City of North St. Paul require a permit. Complete your permit online and easily upload your required documents.

recordTypes.name: Report a Problem: Code Compliance Concerns
Gasoline Distribution License
recordTypes.description: Any business dispensing gasoline in the City of North St. Paul must be licensed.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Interim Use-Level 2 Home Occupation Permit
Pawn Shop License
recordTypes.description: All Pawn Shops located in the City of North St. Paul must be licensed annually and meet current state and city ordinances.

recordTypes.name: Report a Problem: General City Questions/Communications Content
Report a Problem: Public Works/Electrical Concerns
Peddler Solicitor Sales License
recordTypes.description: Any profit, or non-profit agency conducting sales in the City of North St. Paul must obtain a Merchant Solicitor Sales license.

recordTypes.name: Therapeutic Massage Enterprise
recordTypes.description: All Massage Enterprise businesses in the City of North St. Paul must be licensed annually.

recordTypes.name: Therapeutic Massage Practitioner
recordTypes.description: Massage practitioners in the City of North St Paul must apply for an annual license.

recordTypes.name: Trenching (Sewer/Water) Permit
recordTypes.description: Any contractor doing sewer or water work or repairs that impact the connection between the resident's and the City's sanitary sewer or water system, including new or repaired connections must have a Trenching Permit from the City of North St. Paul.

recordTypes.name: Tree Service Permit
recordTypes.description: Any planting, removal or treatment of trees in the public right-of-way require a Tree Service Permit from the City of North St. Paul, including any work that may impact power lines.

recordTypes.name: Site Plan Review
recordTypes.description: Site plan review is required for all new multifamily and nonresidential developments and any additions that result in the expansion of 1,000 square feet.

categories.name: Building, Mechanical and Plumbing Permits
categories.content:
As of October 1, 2024, the following permits are no longer available via OpenGov Citizen Services:

  • Building Permit
  • Mechanical Permit
  • Plumbing Permit

Please apply for Building, Mechanical, and Plumbing Permits here: https://rrc.baselinegov.com/

categories.name: Permits
categories.content:
As of October 1, 2024, the following permits are no longer available via OpenGov Citizen Services:

  • Building Permit
  • Mechanical Permit
  • Plumbing Permit

Please apply for Buildi

categories.name: Right-of-Way
categories.content: Any work in the public right-of-way requires a permit from the City of North St. Paul. This includes any excavation, placement of dumpsters or containers, as well as other public use of the City's right-of-way easements.

categories.name: Zoning Permits
categories.content: The City of North St. Paul requires Zoning Permits for a variety of land use and development.

categories.name: Specialty Permits
categories.content:
Specialty Permits

The City of North St. Paul offers several specialty permits including:

  • Special Event Permits
  • Cell Tower Permits
  • Charitable Gambling P

categories.name: Contractor Licenses
categories.content: The City of North St. Paul requires contractors to be licensed for various work in the City. Please review the list of required contractor licenses before beginning work on your project.

categories.name: Liquor Licenses
categories.content: All Liquor License applicants in the City of North St. Paul  must complete the appropriate application and provide all required documents. The North St. Paul City Council is the final authority on all Liquor License applications. All Liquor Licenses expire on June 30 each year.

categories.name: Rental Housing Licenses & Reports
Police
categories.content: The North St. Paul Police Department serves the safety needs of the City's residents, businesses, and visitors. Please review the following applications for service and/or information provided by the Department.

categories.name: Resident Resources
categories.content: The City of North St. Paul provides many ways for our residents to communicate with staff and participate in our commissions, authorities,  employment and volunteer activities.
